data.message:
I just wanna thank you Eminem 
For giving me the ability to kill syllables and synonyms 
Some people say that I'm an Eminem wanna be 
Better yet a Stan 
Or a dick riding fan 
But these assholes really don't  understand 
What is like to relate to music 
The pencil is my weapon , Thank God I know how to use it 
Without music I would probably mothafuckin' lose it 
This I will not refuse it 
Gotta pay homage 
What I portray on the page equals damage 
You got me into the whole craft 
Metaphors , Punchlines , Smilies , Pro rap 
Back then my lyrics sucked like when hoes gag 
But ever since I've listened to you , The world cracked 
It was cool like a snow act 
Having the power to come up with dope lyrics 
And not giving a shit about ho critics 
Just like how you wrote for your daughter Hailie 
I also write for my baby Emily 
It's crazy cuz constantly , Usually 
I think about writing her a song daily 
Love that song 97' Bonnie and Cylde on the Slim Shady EP 
Just like how your Dad left you 
My Mom left me 
I was 10 I remember vividly 
Moments of torture 
Always had that cold lonely feeling like soul search 
But I kept my chin up and walked along 
Hey Mom look I just socked the wall 
What am I saying ? , You were absence 
Awww 
You were gone like the wind 
It had me broken but I still had 
God within 
I was meant for a great purpose 
I put my sweat and tears lyrically I earn this 
Once again Eminem , Thanks

replies.message: This is sick!! I was thinking of Eminem rapping the lyrics because they sound like his, Sick bro keep writing and spitting them lyrics and you'll be up there man💯
Thanks man I really appreciate it
